template.name: abd-radio
template.value: <div class="row"> <fieldset class="$SIZ$-$NB$ columns"> <legend>$LEG$</legend> <input type="radio" name="$NAM$" value="$VAlUE1$" id="$NAM$$VAlUE1$"><label for="$NAM$$VAlUE1$">$VAlUE1$</label> <input type="radio" name="$NAM$" value="$VAlUE2$" id="$NAM$$VAlUE2$"><label for="$NAM$$VAlUE2$">$VAlUE2$</label> <input type="radio" name="$NAM$" value="$VAlUE3$" id="$NAM$$VAlUE3$"><label for="$NAM$$VAlUE1$">$VAlUE3$</label> <!--input[type=radio name= value= id=]>label[for=]--> </fieldset> </di>

template.name: abd-checkbox
template.value: <div class="row"> <fieldset class="$SIZ$-$NB$ columns"> <legend>$LEG$</legend> <input id="checkbox1" type="checkbox"><label for="checkbox1">$LABL1$</label> <input id="checkbox2" type="checkbox"><label for="checkbox2">$LABL2$</label> <input id="checkbox3" type="checkbox"><label for="checkbox3">$LABL3$</label> <!--input[id= type=checkbox]>label[for=]--> </fieldset> </di>

template.name: zf-pleqr
template.value: {<\div class=\"small-$NBS$ medium-$NBM$ large-$NBL$ columns\"><\div class=\"callout clearfix\"><\div data-equalizer-watch><\/div><\/div><\/div>}*$NBR$$LAST$

template.name: zf-bower
template.value:
<!doctype html> <html class="no-js" lang="en">
<head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <script src="bower_components/modernizr/modernizr.js"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/foundation/css/foundation.css"/> <title></title> </head> <body> $END$
<script src="bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/foundation/js/foundation.min.js"></script> </body>
</html>
